reviews.title: So many pop ups !!!
reviews.comment: This ap popped up ads, chat windows, and web pages all in the first 15 seconds of opening it.  Uninstalled right away.
reviews.author: Jeff Hawkes

reviews.title: Confusing
reviews.comment: Firstly do you use binaural beats or isochronic tones? So please specify if you must use headfones or not not.The audio for the lucid dream plays and then repeats but as it repeats it stops and then plays again which is very distracting.Thanks I will use it anyway.
reviews.author: Trent Hawkins

reviews.title: All ads
reviews.comment: Spams ads every time you click something and puts ads in the notification bar. Worthless
reviews.author: Ira Carbone

reviews.comment: It was crazy every night I dream more frequently and more vivid
reviews.author: Nigele Jones

reviews.title: Pretty impressed
reviews.comment: Results the first night, not bad even without headphones, and has a decent variety. Can\'t complain compared to most other free apps of this kind.
reviews.author: Salem Bretz

reviews.title: Spy software
reviews.comment: Has any one seen all the permissions you give away after you install this app? Permission on your phone calls, your GPS location, etc. After I installed this app my volume took a mind of its own and started going up and down like a ghost was playing with it. I ran a virus scan and sure yes, there was a very active link from this app. This app was profoundly adjusting an attack on my device. After I uninstall it all my problem went away. A lucid dream alright, a lucid nightmare it was!    And if the developer does not no of this then they need to fix this asap.
reviews.author: John Mattaliano

reviews.title: Malware
reviews.comment: Spamming scamming lying cheating low.ife scum. Tab infested with all manner of crap which is intrusive, unwanted and dishonest. Read the install agreement properly. This is a menace
reviews.author: Maria Fitzfitsroy

reviews.title: LUCID DREAMING!!!
reviews.comment: ok so when i 1st started using this i was a total skeptic, NOW i aint cuz ivw actually been sleeping ALOT better,this morning i slept until like 5pm!! this REALLY works!! only bug is that the looping kinda sucks nd it interrupts my brain JUST as im about to fall asleep!!! FIX IT PEOPLE OR I WILL COMPLETELY GO CRAZY!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Lena Miller

reviews.title: Too many ads
reviews.comment: Too many pop ups and ads everywhere, I couldn\'t even use the app!
reviews.author: Julie Wertanen

reviews.title: Invasive
reviews.comment: Instantly started to spam the hell out of my phone.Installed aps I never wanted.Absolutely uninstall
reviews.author: Cris Ven
